ValidationRule.description: If Player Installed is Yes then other fields are required
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( $Profile.Name <> "System Administrator", NOT(ISCHANGED(IsUpdateFromCaseComment__c)), ISPICKVAL(Player_Installed__c , 'Yes') && ( ISBLANK( Player_Type__c ) || ISBLANK( Player_Version__c ) ))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: If your Player Installed is Yes, then you must populate a value in the following fields: Player Type and Player Version
